summary: Mappings primarily intended to ease preparing of USENET/eMail articles
name: Posting-C
description: "Posting" provides a few mappings I once messed around with in order to ease preparing USENET/email articles with GVim. (Due to a malfunction at vim.org I had to register again. Version 1.3 can be found at http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=851.)
